ViewObject.Name: SAREPGraphclosedOppLookup
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT COUNT(OPPORTUNITIES.OPPORTUNITY_ID) as Success FROM OPPORTUNITIES,USERS WHERE OPPORTUNITIES.IS_SUCCESS = 'y' AND USERS.IS_ACTIVE='y' AND OPPORTUNITIES.CREATED_BY_ID=USERS.USER_ID AND USERS.USER_ID=5 AND OPPORTUNITIES.END_DATE < TO_TIMESTAMP('31-MAR-18 05.53.57.120000000 AM') AND OPPORTUNITIES.START_DATE > TO_TIMESTAMP('01-APR-17 05.53.57.120000000 AM')
